item.title: Implement Dark Mode With React
item.description: Being able to switch between light and dark mode has always been a fancy feature in my mind when it comes to the UI part of an app. Recently I’ve done it myself and found it actually quite straightforward to implement. Rationale Aside from any frameworks, let’s think about how color mode switch should work. Apparently we need 2 sets of colors defined with CSS, as well as an easy way to change between them for our HTML elements.
